snippet: Children spend their summers joyfully learning woodland skills and working outdoors in two middle-grade novels.
abstract: Natalie Standiford reviews books Fort by Cynthia DeFelice and The Secrets of Blueberries, Brothers, Moose & Me by Sara Nickerson.
lead_paragraph: Children spend their summers joyfully learning woodland skills and working outdoors in two middle-grade novels.
